DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Patients stratify otoneurological function ( panic disorder without agoraphobia , panic disorder agoraphobia , anxiety disorder without panic agoraphobia-like avoidance , normal control ) . Patients undergo psychiatric interview structure interview focus anxiety disorder . Physical evaluation complete . A vestibular evaluation consist posturography , rotational testing , ocular motor screen battery , positional caloric test complete patient . Patients complete audiological test battery consist basic audiological analysis , speech recognition score , immittance testing , brainstem evoke response , determination binaural mask level difference . Control patient also complete hyperventilation-rotational test .
